databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID , OD_SHR.STATUS , OD_SHR.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID , OD_SHR.SBT , OD_SHR.SHR_NO , OD_SHR.NAIYOU , OD_SHR.BIKOU , OD_SHR.KIKAN_SYSTEM_SHR_NO , OD_SHR.AMOUNT , OD_SHR.NEBIKI_AMOUNT , OD_SHR.TAX , OD_SHR.SHR_IRAI_DATE , OD_SHR.SHR_DATE , OD_SHR.TEKIYOU , OD_SHR.KAMOKU_NO , OD_SHR.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , OD_SHR.SEND_FLAG , OD_SHR.VESSEL_ID , OD_SHR.DATA_NO , OD_SHR.USER_KEY , OD_SHR.RENEW_DATE , OD_SHR.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_SHR.TS , OD_SHR.SHR_TANTOU , OD_SHR.KEIJO_DATE , OD_SHR.SYORI_STATUS , OD_SHR.KIHYOUBI ,OD_SHR.CARRIAGE
#APPEND_COLUMN_STR#
FROM OD_SHR
#APPEND_JOIN_STR#
WHERE OD_SHR.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
LEFT JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID
,OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID as OD_THI_MS_VESSEL_ID ,OD_THI.NAIYOU as OD_THI_NAIYOU ,OD_MK.MS_CUSTOMER_ID as OD_MK_MS_CUSTOMER_ID

,OD_JRY.JRY_DATE as OD_JRY_JRY_DATE ,OD_MK.MS_CUSTOMER_ID as OD_MK_MS_CUSTOMER_ID ,OD_THI.NAIYOU as OD_THI_NAIYOU ,MS_VESSEL.VESSEL_NO as MS_VESSEL_VESSEL_NO ,MS_VESSEL.VESSEL_NAME as MS_VESSEL_VESSEL_NAME ,OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID as OD_THI_MS_VESSEL_ID ,OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID as OD_THI_MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID ,OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID as OD_THI_MS_THI_IRAI_SHOUSAI_ID ,OD_JRY.JRY_NO as OD_JRY_JRY_NO ,OD_THI.JIM_TANTOU_ID as OD_THI_JIM_TANTOU_ID

INNER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID = OD_MK.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MK.OD_MM_ID = OD_MM.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_MM.OD_THI_ID = OD_THI.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

INNER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID = OD_JRY.OD_JRY_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_MK ON OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID = OD_MK.OD_MK_ID AND OD_MK.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_MM ON OD_MK.OD_MM_ID = OD_MM.OD_MM_ID AND OD_MM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN OD_THI ON OD_MM.OD_THI_ID = OD_THI.OD_THI_ID AND OD_THI.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 INNER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON OD_THI.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID

and OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID != :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID and OD_SHR.SBT = 1 and not exists ( select SBT, OD_JRY_ID from OD_SHR TableA WHERE TableA.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 and TableA.SBT = 0 and TableA.OD_JRY_ID = OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID )

and OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID != :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID and OD_SHR.SBT = 1 and OD_SHR.STATUS = 13 and not exists ( select SBT, OD_JRY_ID from OD_SHR TableA WHERE TableA.CANCEL_FLAG = 0 and TableA.SBT = 0 and TableA.OD_JRY_ID = OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID )
and OD_THI.MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID != :MS_THI_IRAI_STATUS_ID and OD_SHR.SBT = 0 and ((OD_SHR.STATUS = 0 or OD_SHR.STATUS = 2) or (OD_SHR.STATUS = 3 AND TO_CHAR(OD_SHR.SHR_DATE,'YYYYMM') > :SHR_DATE))
INNER JOIN OD_JRY ON OD_JRY.OD_MK_ID = OD_MK.OD_MK_ID AND OD_JRY.CANCEL_FLAG = 0
AND TO_CHAR(OD_JRY.JRY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') >= TO_CHAR(:JRY_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(OD_JRY.JRY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') <= TO_CHAR(:JRY_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD')
ORDER BY OD_THI.TEHAI_IRAI_NO, OD_MM.MM_NO, OD_MK.MK_NO, OD_JRY.JRY_NO, OD_SHR.SHR_NO
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID AND OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM OD_GAISAN_KEIJO WHERE OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID AND OD_GAISAN_KEIJO.GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI = :GAISAN_KEIJO_ZUKI )

INNER JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_ID = OD_SHR.OD_SHR_ID INNER JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID = OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID AND OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID

INNER JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_JRY_ID = OD_SHR.OD_JRY_ID INNER JOIN OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM ON OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID = OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD.OD_SHR_GASSAN_HEAD_ID AND OD_SHR_GASSAN_ITEM.OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID

INSERT INTO OD_SHR ( OD_SHR_ID , STATUS , CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_ID , SBT , SHR_NO , NAIYOU , BIKOU , KIKAN_SYSTEM_SHR_NO , AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX , KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , SHR_IRAI_DATE , SHR_DATE , TEKIYOU ,
SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , SHR_TANTOU , KEIJO_DATE , SYORI_STATUS , KIHYOUBI ,CARRIAGE ) VALUES ( :OD_SHR_ID , :STATUS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :OD_JRY_ID , :SBT , :SHR_NO , :NAIYOU , :BIKOU , :KIKAN_SYSTEM_SHR_NO , :AMOUNT , :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , :TAX , :KAMOKU_NO , :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , :SHR_IRAI_DATE , :SHR_DATE , :TEKIYOU ,
:SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :SHR_TANTOU , :KEIJO_DATE , :SYORI_STATUS , :KIHYOUBI ,:CARRIAGE )

UPDATE OD_SHR SET STATUS = :STATUS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , OD_JRY_ID = :OD_JRY_ID , SBT = :SBT , SHR_NO = :SHR_NO , NAIYOU = :NAIYOU , BIKOU = :BIKOU , KIKAN_SYSTEM_SHR_NO = :KIKAN_SYSTEM_SHR_NO , AMOUNT = :AMOUNT , NEBIKI_AMOUNT = :NEBIKI_AMOUNT , TAX = :TAX , KAMOKU_NO = :KAMOKU_NO , UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO = :UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NO , SHR_IRAI_DATE = :SHR_IRAI_DATE , SHR_DATE = :SHR_DATE , TEKIYOU = :TEKIYOU ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , SHR_TANTOU = :SHR_TANTOU , KEIJO_DATE = :KEIJO_DATE , SYORI_STATUS = :SYORI_STATUS , KIHYOUBI = :KIHYOUBI ,CARRIAGE = :CARRIAGE
WHERE OD_SHR_ID = :OD_SHR_ID AND TS = :TS
